channel.title: Yell command compile error!

item.title: Yell command compile error!
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

Hey guys, I have a problem with my yell command, this is the compile error:

.\Command.java:235: illegal start of expression if (cmd.startsWith("yell") && cmd.length() > 5)) { ^ .\Command.java:240: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ .\Command.java:244: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

and this is the command:

[code] if (cmd.startsWith(“yell”) && cmd.length() > 5)) {
cmd.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
cmd.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
cmd.substring(5).trim();

            	} else {
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = PlayerName+": "+cmd.substring(5);
		}[/code]

Read full topic
